visualize
Class PostVisualizer

java.lang.Object
  visualize.PostVisualizer

public class PostVisualizer
extends java.lang.Object

Class for visualizing postprocessing information.

Murat

private double minDistance_
Maximum and minimum distances between nodes. Used for scaling objects.

maxDisplacement_

private double maxDisplacement_
Maximum displacement of all nodes. Used for scaling displacements.

scale_

private java.lang.Double scale_
Scaling factor used for scaling displacements when automatic scaling is not used.

factors_

private double[] factors_
Array storing the scaling factors of drawing. The sequence is; radius of nodes, radius of lines, diagram height.

                                int option,
                                int[] comp)
Draws results on undeformed shape of the structure.

Parameters:
owner - The owner frame of drawing.
option - The result option for drawing results.
comp - The component to be drawn.

drawDeformedShape

public void drawDeformedShape(SolidMAT owner,
                              int option,
                              int[] comp,
                              boolean isScaled,
                              int step)
Draws results on deformed shape of the structure.

Parameters:
owner - The owner frame of drawing.
option - The result option for drawing results.
comp - The component to be drawn.
isScaled - True if displacements are scaled, false if not.
step - The step number of drawing.

drawScalor

private void drawScalor(SolidMAT owner,
                        int step)
Draws contour scalor for the deformed shape option.

Parameters:
owner - The owner of contour scalor.
step - The step number of drawing.

computeScalors

private void computeScalors()
Computes maximum and minimum distances between nodes of structure. These distances are used for scaling objects.

private void check(int option,
                   int[] comp)
Checks given parameters for graphics.

Parameters:
option - Result option.
comp - The demanded component of result.
